title: failed chunked upload in the loop - unknown error (errno 5) on otherwise healthy local disk
body:
hello,

one of my files fails to upload with unknown error. server: 5.0.13 (ee), client 1.4.2 redhat.

it's a 2.2 gb movie: the progress bar looks good until ~1.1gb and then immediately goes to 2.2gb with error message.

nothing in the owncloud.log on the server.

only first chunk created on the server:
````
# ls -l ..../moscicki/cache/
-rw-r--r--. 1 apache apache 10m nov 21  2013 cimg1029.mov-chunking-3089998825-0
````
i can touch and write into this directory on the server without problems (as apache user).

ssl_access_log also only shows one chunk being put.

in mirall log: 230 chunks are prepared but then mirall fails at the first chunk upload:
````
11-20 15:09:22:933 status.php returns:  "{"installed":"true","version":"5.0.24","versionstring":"5.0.13","edition":"enterprise"}"   0  reply:  qnetworkreplyimpl(0x1182fe0) 
11-20 15:09:22:933 #-------# oc found on  "https://cbox05.cern.ch/owncloud" 
11-20 15:09:23:328 oc_module: chunk upload completed for 'ownclouds://cbox05.cern.ch/owncloud/remote.php/webdav/blah/chep-video/cimg1029.mov' (10485760 bytes out of 2411724800)
11-20 15:09:53:444 _csync_push_file: file: /home/moscicki/owncloud-cbox05/blah/chep-video/cimg1029.mov, command: sendfile, error: unknown error. from errno 5
11-20 15:09:53:444 _csync_push_file: remember chunk: 0  (transfer id -1204968471 )
11-20 15:09:53:444 _csync_report_parent_error: mark parent directoy `blah/chep-video` as an error
````
